headline: Best Buy CEO raises a red flag on an alarming economic trend
summary: Best Buy CEO Corie Barry has to stay at least a few steps ahead of economic trends. She has help, of course, but the CEO needs to know months, and sometimes even further, in advance where consumer sentiment will land. If customers want value and Best Buy has nothing but luxury brands, sales will ...
